title: New "W" magazine cover..
content:
Anyone see the new cover to "W", with the Kate Moss spreads?   
   
I'm curious to know what the Sans face is that they are using on the cover.   
   
I was hoping to see it in title use throughout the mag, but no luck. Stuck with clarendon.   
   
Sorry couldnt find a pic of the cover.   
   
hildebrant.
author: Hildebrant

comments.content:
I don't know if this'll help...   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1235.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018234749/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1235.html)   
   
hhp

Hrant pointed on the right direction with that link. I have seen   
the magazine and the cover is set on a bold weight of June by [Hubert Jocham.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018234749/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/)

Ahh..   
   
Thanks. Funny but I have subscribed to the Magazine for a couple years, and this is the FIRST time I remember seeing this face.   
   
Quite nice, for titling, if I could say so.   
   
hildebrant.

Ahh..   
   
Thanks. Funny but I have subscribed to the Magazine for a couple years, and this is the FIRST time I remember seeing this face.   
   
Quite nice, for titling, if I do say so.   
   
Any ideas if it is available for purchase?   
   
hildebrant.

Thanks Stephen.   
   
More curious to see what he charges than anything.

Jocham's work [appears](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018234749/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/13784.html) in the ID forums often.   
His contact info is at his site, if you're interested in buying, Kyle.
Cool. Send him an email. He's won't bite.
